page.title: 12SHOPPING
page.content:
There are not very many shops in the area, but here are some of them; grocers, the bakery, Wimpy bar and sweet shops. New measures are currently proposed that may stop local shops from displaying their goods on the pavements.
{Green-grocers.} In 1985, if you went shopping in a green-grocer's shop, you would expect to find {Fruit}& {Vegetables. { Bananas}are a fruit you might buy. They are about 10 cm in length and 6 to 8 cm round. This fruit grows in tropical climates. It grows on trees and is picked when green. When they are bought, bananas are yellow. Other fruits that you might buy include peaches, nectarines and cherries (about 65p/lb).
